abstract: British Academy of Film and Television Arts adopts new requirements aimed at fostering diversity in British film industry, plans to add more women and ethnic minorities to membership.

keywords.value: British Academy of Film and Television
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The British Academy of Film and Television Arts has set new requirements to help foster diversity in the British film industry.
snippet: The British Academy of Film and Television Arts has set new requirements to help foster diversity in the British film industry....

headline.main: Baftas So White, but They’re Working on It
headline.print_headline: British Film Awards to Require Diversity
